title: Hybrid work mode: Tech Mahindra only needs 50% office space - Fortune India
content: Hybrid work mode: Tech Mahindra only needs 50% office space  Fortune India
description: “My own reading is that it will be more like 40%. If for every employee I used to provide 150 sq ft of space, I am now going to give them only 60 sq ft,” says managing director and CEO CP Gurnani.
